website_summaries.verdict: Bacteriophage virus-based prebiotic feeds good bacteria while targeting bad bacteria.
pros: Formulated specifically to work in concert with probiotics
Goes after bacteria with host virus to strengthen the number of good bacteria
Helps improve digestive issues and other autoimmune conditions
cons: Some consumers report negative GI effects with use, such as gas pain or nausea

customer_reviews.title: I am in my 70's and have difficulty losing weight ...
customer_reviews.text: I am in my 70's and have difficulty losing weight = with this prebiotic and my probiotic I am able to lose about a pound a week - no other changes.
customer_reviews.author: Capel Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Had to be leaky gut
customer_reviews.text: I honestly believe it helped me right away. I had been taking antibiotics a lot last year that my Dr kept prescribing to me for sinus infection. The probiotics weren't doing anything to help the being tired no energy and really bad acid in my Throat and chest. I took this product and felt better the next day and better still the day after. I will keep taking them
customer_reviews.author: Martin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Relief, relief, relief!
customer_reviews.text: Having had digestive issues for 40 + years and then taking these prebiotics along with probiotics and having a normal functioning digestive system what can I say? Thank you Dr. Tobias, you have cured what five MD's have failed to cure.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get sucker in 'free-bottle zone'
customer_reviews.text: When you see high ratings – you automatically think – ‘this must be a great product’ Why such high ratings? ~ Possibility of getting a free bottle, which I didn't realize at the time What did it do for me? How about a rash from head to toe & I take lots of supplements -- mainly Life Extension & Pure, my probiotic is Pro-50 Be cautious! Offering 'FREE' shouldn't be allowed for a lying about a 5 Star rating
customer_reviews.author: Pipers5

customer_reviews.title: It really helped me!
customer_reviews.text: This worked almost immediately to improve my colon function and relieve the bloat, gas and pain. I wasn't sure it was from this pre-biotic so after 3 months of taking it daily, I stopped. Without it, my symptoms got worse right away, so I ordered another bottle - and as soon as I started taking it again, my symptoms improved. Really good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a product that helped
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after reading reviews from people who suffered from IBS and also belching. I am on medication for my IBS, but still have problems. I also have a belching problem and have had that checked out with an endoscope with normal results. After a month of taking this prebiotic I suddenly realized I had stopped belching! I ran out of the pills while on vacation and within a few days, the belching returned. Back on the pills for two days and the belching has disappeared. Couldn't be happier! Am taking this in conjunction with a powerful probiotic and the two together is helping with my IBS. Not 100%, but much better
customer_reviews.author: giagem

customer_reviews.title: Essential for my health!
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a quest to become more healthy. As a result, I have been doing cleanses, working with a naturopathic dr. And reading many books on this subject. I thought just taking the Dr. Tobias probiotic- deep immune would balance out my gut flora. But the more I studied this topic I realized that prebiotics enhance this process. So - I am taking both products and I have really noticed a difference. I feel better, I look better and friends are verifying this. Do yourself a favor and try these products! It is wonderful to finally find a line of products that are effective!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have used probiotics for years but this is my first time using prebiotics. After using them for a week, I believe they are helping me. It took a few days getting used to them. But now I definitely feel less bloated. Others have stated that they diminished the desire for sweet snacks and I really did not believe it but now that I think of it, I do have less cravings
customer_reviews.author: John DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This product has changed my life.
customer_reviews.text: Even after reading the positive reviews here, I had a reasonable skepticism. I have IBS and tried everything, and I mean everything, looking for relief. Words cannot express how truly incredible this product is. After 2 weeks, ALL of my bloating is gone. “Bathroom issues” are a thing of the past. As an unexpected bonus, I have lost 5 lbs. Yes, 5 lbs. And for $25 a month without obligation or covertly being enrolled in a monthly club that is nearly impossible to get out of, the value is unbeatable. I cannot recommend it highly enough. It has changed my life.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Foster

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING. I was eating a poor diet (‘tis the season) and had no motivation to exercise. One day into starting this prebiotic, I noticed an INSTANT curb in appetite, no longer craved “the bad stuff”, and had incredible energy to work out! I quickly switched from a poor diet to a vegetable-rich, smart diet. I can’t stress how impressed I am with this prebiotic. I wish I would have incorporated this into my life years ago. Trust me. Buy the product. Give it a chance. Drop the poor diet. Order the salad. Drink the water. Feel better! Thank you, Dr. Tobias!!!
customer_reviews.author: uknowhatheysay

customer_reviews.title: Back on the way to good health!
customer_reviews.text: I have been consuming Splenda and NutraSweet in large amounts for the last 20 years or so and I have gained a lot of weight in the process. I have learned that these artificial sweeteners kill the good bacteria in the digestive tract, so I started on a Pro-Biotic and noticed some great changes. Then I learned that I needed to replace my own good bacteria and needed a good Pre-Biotic to do that, so I ordered your product. I am off all artificial sweeteners, and well on my way to good digestive health with your GutMeister product.

customer_reviews.title: A Rapid Response
customer_reviews.text: My issues: irritable bowel syndrome for almost 30 yrs; wicked heartburn for about 5 yrs. A recent minor procedure sent my entire GI system and pelvis into a siege of cramping, really really painful. Antispasomodics, xanax, variety of antacids, Align, rifaximin, Reglan, gabapentin...I've never in my life tried so many meds and had so little relief. I took this little Dr T pill not even 20 minutes ago, so this is a very short-term report: I feel SO MUCH BETTER! A kind of calm has already come over my gut. Can this last oh please oh please? I am a tough case. I can only hope.Will report back in future.

customer_reviews.title: It really makes a difference, just have to give it a few days

I have seen people saying in reviews that their hair started growing again, I have no evidence of that probably because I have not been taking it long enough. My wife who has constant constipation issues started taking it and I don't know if its all in her head but she is having much less constipation with this combined with probiotic. It really does work but you have to take it for several days to notice the difference.

I took Dr. Tobias Gut meiser prebotics and the Dr. Tobias 30 billion probiotics together for this first month. I now am down to 3 bathroom visits per day and on a schedule that allows me to plan my day for trips, etc. I recommend these products highly.

So after some looking, I settled on Dr. Tobias GutMeister. I have had fantastic results, no bloating and no taking probiotics 3 times a day (saving money). This product has worked wonderfully for me, I haven't felt this good in years. I am now a lifetime customer.

The probiotics seemed to make it worse, & I didn't want to take antibiotics, but chose to use natural products instead, ie: goldenseal and oil of oregano. So I stopped taking the probiotics and added GutMeister as it only feeds the good bacteria, & also makes it difficult for the bad bacteria to adhere to the intestines. I noticed an improvement after taking it. It seems to bolster my body's defense against the infection. It is a unique and valuable product.

customer_reviews.title: GutMeister is a great digestive aid
customer_reviews.text: I am a 70-year-old active woman, but my digestion as well as my energy had become impaired. I had researched through NIMH information on the intestinal biome and its importance in improving overall health. I had used other probiotics and prebiotics, but this one, GutMeister, is the best one. My cravings for carbohydrates have greatly diminished. My belly fat has decreased by about 25% this month. I have lost 4 pounds without dieting. And my tummy bloating is also much less. For the first three or four days, my belly was challenged, but I stuck with the product because I expected some release of toxins. The problem passed, and I feel healthier overall

After a 6 week course of multiple antibiotic infusions for a brain infection, I constantly felt queasy and hungry. Even after a large meal I didn't feel satiated. Thought I'd give this a try to try and get my gut back into balance. I've only taken it for 15 days so far and am not certain how beneficial it is but I am not feeling the need to eat all the time.

My wife has been trying to lose weight - this seems to have helped stop her craving for sugar which in turn has helped her lose 10 lbs. Thank you! This seems to be a good product.

I've been taking it for almost 3 weeks and I now consider myself 'regular' and I haven't had any constipation or irregularity since starting gutmeister.

customer_reviews.title: great Prebiotic!
customer_reviews.text: I have taken different Prebiotics in the past that just made me more bloated and gave me gas, this one is different, it actually helps bloating. These are called bacteriophage. "phage means to devour", bacteriophages are viruses that devour bad bacteria and make room for good ones, so you probably want to add a probiotic after you take these by themselves to see how your body reacts first. I have histamine intolerance, and had no side effects. Probiotics usually cause histamine, so this works well by itself. I have been able to eat some carbs without bad reaction I had in the past. Very happy and will reorder.

It is my understanding that prebiotics help to feed the probiotics, and help to eliminate the bad bacteria in the lower intestines. So far this combination seems to be working. My mother no longer has diarrhea after a year of fighting it, and I am almost back to normal.

customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: The solution for your stomach or gastric issues
customer_reviews.text: Well if anyone in this planet currently having gastric or stomach issue you will need to try this product first before you do anything else. All I can say it’s life saver period. Thank you for there wonderful research hopefully millions will get there life back with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Get your gut in line.....
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking the product for about 2 weeks now and my whole digestive system seems more normal. I have suffered with IBS for several years and have made many changes to my diet and eating habits (not getting too full). A pre-biotic was recommended along with probiotics which I have been taking for years. I have switched to Dr Tobias' Probiotics too. I think these are really helping. I will know more in a month or so.....but I have put both these products on my Subscribe and Save. Won't be going off them any time soo
customer_reviews.author: Dee M

customer_reviews.title: Prebiotic pro and con
customer_reviews.text: I understand the science behind Prebiotics, but honestly I do not feel any measureable difference after taking them. That doesn't mean they aren't working for good for me, I just can't say they make me feel and differently.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: I used this along with the Candida fx and a good probiotic and my issues were gone in a week
customer_reviews.text: First off, I purchased this product and am not giving this review in exchange for anything. I had been chasing down digestive issues for years with no success. I used this along with the Candida fx and a good probiotic and my issues were gone in a week. I don't know which product did the trick or if it was the combination, but I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Roger J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with Crohn's disease 10 years ago and was prescribed Humira for treatment, which has destroyed my immune system and made me susceptible to so many infections and illnesses. Since trying this product initially a few months ago and ingesting it daily since, I have noticed a major improvement in my symptoms of stomach pain. Additionally my immune system seems to have improved as I have not gotten sick or any infections since utilizing these pre-biotics. I have been trying so many vitamins and pro-biotics to help with these issues, but nothing has worked as well as these thus far. I am forever grateful and highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Solved the problem!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was having a terrible time with diarrhea. A family member had C-diff and I was afraid I had caught it. I didn't want to go to the doctor and find out because I didn't want to take antibiotics. I decided to try Dr. Tobias GutMeister combined with Dr. Tobias Probiotics30 instead. The combo solved my problem in about 10 days. Obviously I didn't have C-diff or I doubt it would be solved so quickly. A nice side effect of the combo is it tamed my appetite and I have lost a few pounds. I will continue to take both products for a few months then change over to Dr. Tobias all in one pro and pre biotics.
customer_reviews.author: Darline Dieffenbacher

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Just so happens, I did some research on how your gut can cause so many issues. I had more than IBS issues but leg tingling and more. I started this and two days later I felt brand new! I reviewed the company's site and I will give some of their other products a try too. Believe me here...it worked for me. Each person is different but I would and will recommend this to anyone. Price is a little steep, that is the only negative.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: GutMeister is the best prebiotic I have ever taken. I immediately noticed a significant reduction of my IBS symptoms. In addition to GI improvement, I also feel GutMeister has made an improvement in my overall health. I have been looking for a product like GutMeistee for years, I’m so happy to have finally found it. Thank you for developing such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya E.

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Since taking this supp, I've noticed an increase in energy, and it's definitely had an impact on my digestive system. Whereas my probiotic had kind of stopped working, adding this to my regimen has made quite a difference.
customer_reviews.author: T. Money

customer_reviews.title: Where's the form for Free Bottle, sure isnt on your website. Just a uTube video!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Gut Meister Profor Pro Ultimate for dogs. Received with a leaflet stating receive a Free bottle. Went to website and there is NO form available for free bottle. All there is is a uTube video telling you how to go to website and clain your free bottle. What the heck...catch 22! Why offer Free Bottle IF one has to jump through hopps to just be given the run around.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Torres Witherby

customer_reviews.title: Really Helps Me
customer_reviews.text: I have been incapacitated by IBS for over 10 years. This is one of the very few OTC medications that have given me ANY relief. I’ll so tired of stuff that just stops the symptoms. I am feeling so much better and have lost about 5 lbs despite the fact that I am eating more normally. I am interested in cooking again and am liking fruits and vegetables and limited dairy foods without gas, bloating and “the runs.” I’m very grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Alice

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything for me
customer_reviews.text: After such great reviews I was hoping for some posititve results, but I didn't achieve any of the gastric goals I hoping it would address. I have candida and maybe it's just too severe for any results.
customer_reviews.author: G. Luker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take and easy to remember to take
customer_reviews.text: Been taking for about 10 days. Very easy to take. Also easy to remember to take, since it doesn't have to be refrigerated. Been taking in combination with a probiotic and have been feeling more regular. No adverse side effects. So far I'm happy with the product and have already ordered a second bottle. I gave it four stars for right now because I believe it's beneficial based on everything I read but it probably also needs more time, in combination with the probiotic, to feel the full benefits. Will update the review in a couple of months if warranted.
customer_reviews.author: CardiOne

customer_reviews.title: Ive always had constipation and issues with slow moving bowels ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive always had constipation and issues with slow moving bowels. Not with this!! I combined this with my daily probiotics and I was regular, if not sometimes urgently, by the third day. Also, my bloating is gone. This is a keeper for me!
customer_reviews.author: INTRUTH

customer_reviews.title: Works for me in conjunction with probiotics
customer_reviews.text: I recently started stacking this with Renew Life Ultimate Flora and it has been a very welcomed addition to my probiotic regime. Immediately in the morning, on an empty stomach I take one of each and within minutes they start to work. I have not tried any other prebiotic before, so as far as I can tell, it works great. I don't have any other brand to compare it to. If you experience digestion / movement issues, I would recommend trying out a prebiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Giles

customer_reviews.title: Really Worth  Try
customer_reviews.text: I was having lots of gut discomfort and was worried I may need to drastically alter my diet. I tried this product on recommendation from a family member and noticed a huge difference within a few days. My stomach does not gurgle as much throughout the day, I do not feel bloated after eating my meals, and my acid reflux has improved greatly. I take these with the probiotic from DR Tobias as well and the combo cannot be recommended more highly. It's a tad pricey, but worth a shot if you experience stomach discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: D. Donato

customer_reviews.title: Finally seeing results from pro-biotic
customer_reviews.text: I had been taking a high quality pro-biotic alone for several months and was not seeing the results that I should have been. Enter this product, and within days I noticed a huge difference: stomach bloating drastically reduced, etc. Unfortunately, I did not reorder in time and am back to taking the pro-biotic without this and I won't make that mistake again. Thanks so much for making a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay S

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help
customer_reviews.text: I can't quite tell if I am really responding well to these, but I will say my stomach seems to be way more calm when I take these prebiotics. I ran out of them really fast and could feel them work a few minutes after taking them - it seemed to settle my stomach / gas pains pretty quickly, but I was also taking them with their probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!
customer_reviews.text: Immediate benefits when taken with a probiotic. I have suffered with digestive issues for many years and after taking this product my bloat, gas and constant diarrhea went away immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Cressman

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT product. I have been taking a probiotic with much success for a few years now. My DO suggested I complement it with a prebiotic, so after a month of researching and review reading, I decided on Dr. Tobias. I am glad I did. Foods that used to make my stomach uneasy, no longer have that effect. I feel better overall, as well, and I've only been using this product for two weeks. I am excited to see how I feel after using it for a longer period of time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Boaterfly

customer_reviews.title: Finally-some serious help for my gut!
customer_reviews.text: Came across this item while browsing on Amazon and thought "Seriously? over 2,000 reviews? But I read many and decided to give it a try. All those good reviews were right on-my gut has not felt this good since 2004 when I had 3 cases of food poisoning. I have been tested many times and remain gluten, dairy and egg intolerant and have learned to live with that. But to be able to have day after day with NO GUT PAIN and normal bowel function is amazing and I guess I will be taking this amazing little pill for life.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: It works great to help my belly bloat and works well with ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great to help my belly bloat and works well with my probiotic to keep me regular. I have tried other products but they did not work as good as Dr Tobias does. It helps me feel better about my health because the toxins are more easily eliminated from my system.
customer_reviews.author: SusanR

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this product, honestly never really heard of a prebiotic, I suffer from constipation and I have tried just taking a probiotic but that never seemed to help, I did some reading on prebiotic so I thought I would give it a try, And I am so happy I did, has help a lot! This had been added in my daily routine along w a probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: KATIE BRONGO

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product has kept me regular. I have IBS and this product has helped with discomfort/bloating after I eat and keeping my digestive system moving as it should. I love it! I have also noticed a major decrease in breakouts on my face since I started using it. I can tell it is really balancing out my gut. I will continue to use this product along with a daily probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: in the morning like clock work
customer_reviews.text: This product has help regulate my movements. I usually went every other day to two days apart. Now it is once a day, every day, in the morning like clock work. If I have eaten a lot the day before I will actually go twice. I was amazed. I get completely empty and it's easy to pass. I don't get that growling stomach ache like I have to go but can't. My guts are relaxed and my belly bulge is going down. I will continue to use this product, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Daeja1

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a huge challenge of not picking up every flu and bug that comes along. I am a hospice nurse and a nanny and mother. I have been using probiotics for years and a particular brand for many of them. I got extremely ill in January of this year and decided to make a change. What appealed to me about your product was it’s ability to travel through the stomach acid and arrive in the gut. I have noticed a remarkable strength in my immunity and gut comfort.
customer_reviews.author: wendy bernacki

customer_reviews.title: Possibly improving gut health
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product in hopes of improving my gut health. I am unsure what the full benefits are at the moment. The only changes I have experienced so far are improved bowel function, and, it seems that I am absorbing the nutrients better from the foods I am eating, possibly due to the prebiotics along with the probiotics I am using at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Preston

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking a probiotic for a while and just never knew what kind of prebiotic to take. I am kind of skeptical when it comes to health food trends. But after doing a decent amount of research I decided to try a prebiotic. I have been super happy. I can tell a huge difference. It probably sounds crazy, but my tummy actually feels good. I have been taking them along with a gut friendly diet, but I definitely think they have helped supplement that.
customer_reviews.author: Kaela

customer_reviews.title: Works and I feel better.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to help me. I no longer have constipation, and generally feel better too! Only minor issue is I occasionally get the runs, but that could be me still adjusting to it, or it could be because I've been eating a lot of exotic foods lately at Vietnamese and Thai restaurants. Over all, it's good. I'm buying more, and I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Within days I started having BMs without any laxatives as I was used to do. I combined this with Candida support pills and so far no signs of yeast infection. I will continue using both. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been doing the plant paradox diet and have been taking a prebiotic along with a probiotic in the mornings. We have been using the Gutmeister prebiotic for 2 months and are feeling great! We highly recommend Dr Tobias products!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had given up on finding anything that would help with my bloating, gas, and stomach pain. My daughter suggested Dr. Tobias Gutmeister Prebiotics. I ordered them and have been using them for over a month now. My gas and bloating have lessened so much. I wish I would have known about these prebiotics a long time ago. I am on my second batch and will definitely continue purchasing these. I am also taking Gutmeister Probiotics along with the prebiotics. Love both products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for bloat, a flatter tummy and improved digestion
customer_reviews.text: This worked within hours just like it promised! I am into my second bottle and must admit I am taking one in the morning with a probiotic, and one in the evening because any bloat I had has gone away completely, my tummy actually flattened out, and my digestive system has kicked into a higher gear. I'm hooked on this and will take it as part of my permanent daily program of supplements! Thank you Dr. Tobias, for getting me to my goal of a flatter tummy and greater overall "feel".
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. I take probiotics and enzymes daily, but I really felt the difference with the pre-biotics. I didn't have the bloating and cramping that I usually have. I tried one a day and didn't see the difference, but I really felt the difference with two a day. It allowed me to eat things I love like cheese and bread. My only concern was the cost. Since I have to take two a day to see the difference it is just a bit expensive for me.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for us.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the recommendation of Carlton at Animal Biome. It did not work well for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Like that it’s shelf stable
customer_reviews.text: I’m waiting to see if it helps with my probiotic, but I have high hopes because of the reviews I read on certain websites. Will update in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JULIANN B.

customer_reviews.title: Prebiotics are MORE important than the Probiotics:  Use Both, and Feel Great!
customer_reviews.text: ONLY after using this product for 3 weeks, it has done a tremendous job! After years of suffering with IBS with Constipation, this along with a Probiotic, has done a WONDERFUL JOB!
customer_reviews.author: Lawed

customer_reviews.title: The one thing that has really helped!
customer_reviews.text: Has worked wonders for me. Noticef some improvement first day. But full benefit really kicked in 3-4th day. Bloating, gone. BM's are much more normal. Digestive system at peace now.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: Can't give 5 stars yet because I have made several ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't give 5 stars yet because I have made several changes and don't know what to attribute them to yet. One is a slight upset stomach some times. Don't know cause at this time.
customer_reviews.author: mary j sutcliffe

product_meta.title: Dr Tobias Prebiotic - The Perfect Complement & Boost for Every Probiotics Supplement
feature_bullets: TAKE CARE OF YOUR DIGESTIVE PROBLEMS: Supports the elimination of bloating, stomach discomfort and diarrhea.
OPTIMAL FOR GUT HEALTH: Prebiotics and probiotics are essential for your gut health and immune system.
ULTIMATE PREBIOTIC: Supports your floral balance by feeding healthy bacteria and targeting the bad. Effective on its own or enhanced when paired with probiotics.
QUALITY ENSURED: Made from non-GMO ingredients in an inspected GMP-certified facility.
THIRD-PARTY TESTED FACILITY: For product purity, effectiveness, ingredient safety, nutritional value and label accuracy. The highest standard guaranteed.
